promptForArtist.summary: Create a hand-illustrated watercolor map of Pennsylvania for the Collaborative Journalism Summit 2026 website. Style should match vintage cartography with visible brushstrokes and paper texture. Emphasize Pittsburgh's Three Rivers confluence in the southwest with 2-3 simplified bridge arches. Include Allegheny Mountain ridges in muted blue-grey, forested hills in sage green, and river systems in teal. Optional: Include the Pennsylvania state bird (ruffed grouse) perched near Pittsburgh. Color palette is muted and earthyâ€”teal, cream, ink blue, sage green. NO sports references, NO corporate logos, NO vector-clean edges. Think WPA poster art meets naturalist field guide.
promptForArtist.outputFormat: PNG with transparent background, minimum 2000px wide
